definition: of or relating to a yellow or greenish fluid that is secreted by the liver and that aids especially in the emulsification and absorption of fats : of or relating to bile (see bile sense 1b)
marked by or suffering from liver dysfunction and especially excessive secretion of bile
appearing as if affected by a bilious disorder
of or indicative of a peevish ill-natured disposition

examples: with clapboards painted red and bilious yellow
